defaultMessage: You Need To Install MetaMask to Continue
Add MetaMask extension - Go to metamask page
Then Create an account. You are given a seed phrase that can be used to restore all the accounts you ever create withing Metamask.
You will need to purchase ETH from an exchange, and then transfer the ETH from your exchange wallet to your MetaMask wallet
You cannot use USD with BitBrackets pools â€” any currencies need to be converted into ETH first.
You can try BitBrackets with play money if you are using the Rinkeby test platform at https://rinkeby.bitbrackets.io, follow this link to load MetaMask with play ether
